faq.title: Frequently Asked
faq.subtitle: Get answers to common questions about our development process, pricing, and support.

items.question: How long does a typical project take?
items.answer:
Project timelines vary based on complexity:

• Landing pages: 1-2 weeks
• Web applications: 8-20 weeks
• Mobile apps: 8-24 weeks

We provide detailed timelines during consultation and stick to agreed deadlines with 98% on-time delivery rate.

items.question: What's included in your pricing?
items.answer:
Our transparent pricing includes:

• Complete design and development
• Mobile-responsive implementation
• Quality assurance testing
• Deployment and launch support
• Post-launch support period
• Source code and documentation

Pricing starts at $2,500 for landing pages, $15,000 for web applications and mobile apps. No hidden fees or surprise charges - everything is outlined upfront.

items.question: Do you provide ongoing support after launch?
items.answer:
Yes! Every project includes:

• 3-12 months of free support (varies by package)
• Bug fixes and minor updates
• Performance monitoring
• Security updates
• Technical assistance

Extended support plans are available for long-term partnerships.

items.question: Can you work with our existing systems?
items.answer:
Absolutely! We specialize in integrations:

• CRM systems (Salesforce, HubSpot)
• Payment processors (Stripe, PayPal)
• Analytics platforms (Google Analytics)
• Email marketing tools (Mailchimp)
• Custom APIs and databases

We'll assess your current setup and recommend the best integration approach.

items.question: What if I need changes during development?
items.answer:
We expect changes and plan for them:

• Each package includes revision rounds
• Clear change request process
• Transparent pricing for additional work
• Regular check-ins to catch issues early
• Flexible development approach

Most changes can be accommodated without affecting timeline or budget.

items.question: How do you ensure project quality?
items.answer:
Quality is built into every step:

• Code reviews and testing at each milestone
• Automated testing and quality gates
• Performance optimization
• Security best practices
• Cross-browser and device testing
• User acceptance testing

We deliver production-ready code that meets enterprise standards.

cta.title: Still Have Questions?
cta.subtitle: Get personalized answers from our team. Book a free consultation to discuss your project.

company.name: QK DEV
company.description: Transform your business ideas into powerful digital solutions. We deliver quality development services with transparent pricing and guaranteed timelines.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.content:
Information We Collect

We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you create an account, make a purchase, or contact us for support.

How We Use Your Information

We use the information we collect to provide, maintain, and improve our services, process transactions, and communicate with you.

Information Sharing

We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties without your consent, except as described in this policy.

Data Security

We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.

Your Rights

You have the right to access, update, or delete your personal information. You may also opt out of certain communications from us.

Last updated: {{date}}

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.content:
Acceptance of Terms

By accessing and using our services, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement.

Use License

Permission is granted to temporarily download one copy of the materials on our website for personal, non-commercial transitory viewing only.

Service Availability

We strive to maintain high service availability but do not guarantee uninterrupted access to our services.

User Responsibilities

Users are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of their account information and for all activities that occur under their account.

Limitation of Liability

In no event shall QK DEV or its suppliers be liable for any damages arising out of the use or inability to use our services.

Last updated: {{date}}

cookies.title: Cookie Policy
cookies.content:
What Are Cookies

Cookies are small text files that are placed on your computer or mobile device when you visit our website.

How We Use Cookies

We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience, analyze site traffic, and personalize content and advertisements.

Types of Cookies

  • Essential Cookies: Necessary for the website to function properly
  • Analytics Cookies: Help us understand how visitors interact with our website
  • Marketing Cookies: Used to track visitors across websites for advertising purposes

Managing Cookies

You can control and/or delete cookies as you wish. You can delete all cookies that are already on your computer and set most browsers to prevent them from being placed.

Last updated: {{date}}

gdpr.title: GDPR Compliance
gdpr.content:
Data Controller

QK DEV is the data controller for the personal data we collect and process.

Legal Basis for Processing

We process personal data based on legitimate interests, contractual necessity, and consent where applicable.

Your Rights Under GDPR

  • Right to access your personal data
  • Right to rectification of inaccurate data
  • Right to erasure ("right to be forgotten")
  • Right to restrict processing
  • Right to data portability
  • Right to object to processing

Data Retention

We retain personal data only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes for which it was collected.

Data Transfers

When we transfer data outside the EEA, we ensure appropriate safeguards are in place.

Last updated: {{date}}

security.title: Security
security.content:
Security Measures

We implement comprehensive security measures to protect your data and our systems.

Data Encryption

All data is encrypted in transit and at rest using industry-standard encryption protocols.

Access Controls

We implement strict access controls and regularly review permissions to ensure only authorized personnel can access sensitive data.

Security Monitoring

We continuously monitor our systems for security threats and vulnerabilities.

Incident Response

In the event of a security incident, we have procedures in place to respond quickly and notify affected users.

Third-Party Security

We carefully vet all third-party services and ensure they meet our security standards.

Last updated: {{date}}
